import React, { useState } from 'react' function AddProduct({addproduct}) { const [name,setName]=useState("") const [imagUrl,setimageUrl]=useState("") const [description,setdescription]=useState("") const [price,setPrice]=useState("") return (
setName(e.target.value)} placeholder={name} id="exampleInputEmail1" aria-describedby="emailHelp"/>
setimageUrl(e.target.value)} placeholder={imagUrl} id="exampleInputPassword1"/>
setdescription(e.target.value)} placeholder={description} id="exampleInputPassword1"/>
setPrice(e.target.value)} placeholder={price} id="exampleInputEmail1" aria-describedby="emailHelp"/>
) } export default AddProduct
